page.title: 10BREL Glasgow Works
page.content: ]There were 4 huge locomotive works in Springburn-the St Rollox Works of the Caledonian Railway Co.;North British Railway Co.Works at Cowlairs;Hyde Park Works of Neilson and Co;Atlas Works of Sharp Stewart and Co.They are gone and the only works in the railway industry is British Rail Engineering Limited, set up to repair,service and modify carriages and rolling stock.1800 are employed.As BR make economies in many areas the engineering works will have to do the same.By 1987 the workforce has to be cut to 500.Much information is being given by the media as to how Springburn was once the locomotive capital of the world,building engines for the railway companies in Britain, and for export to many countries.The workforce at the"Caley"is preparing to fight to keep the work and skills that for long have been in Springburn.
